scripts.generate-auth-api-sdk: npm run clean:auth-api-sdk && openapi-generator generate -g typescript-angular -i http://staging.tikioo.com/auth-api/v3/api-docs -o ./sdk/auth-api-sdk --additional-properties npmName=auth-api-sdk,snapshot=true,ngVersion=9.1.4,fileNaming=kebab-case,npmVersion=1.0.0,useSingleRequestParameter=true
